description: Try our easy to follow Sharwood's Butter Chicken Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sharwood's Butter Chicken Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil a frypan over medium high heat, add chicken and cook for 45 minutes each side till golden. Pour in Sharwood’s Butter Chicken Simmer Sauce and cook for 8-10 minutes, over medium low heat till cooked through, and reduced slightly. Slice chicken.
Preheat oven to 200c. Line two trays with baking paper. Place naan bread on prepared trays and cook for 5 minutes till crisp.
Serve topped chicken, cherry tomatoes, yoghurt, mint leaves and Sharwood’s Mango Chutney.
